about_the_game:
※ The content of this DLC purchase will be applied immediately. This DLC purchase is not refundable.

Enjoy this summer with the Essential Summer Pack. With a Character Rebirth Ticket and summer exclusive costumes such as Oversized Short-Sleeve T-shirt, Stretch Pants, and Strap Sandals, this pack is truly a must-have for Chasers avoiding the hot summer sun.

Rebirth Benefits:
- Select new personality type, gender, appearance and more to create your own, unique character!
- Assets will no longer be locked based on personality type, and there are special assets only available after rebirth!
- Redistribute your stats
- Choose a new character name for a brand new start

Included Items:
- Character Rebirth Ticket x 1
- Oversized Short-Sleeve T-shirt
- Stretch Pants
- Strap Sandals

name: KurtzPel - Essential Summer Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 6100 3.7 GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 ti or AMD Radeon™ R7 360 (VRAM 2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Low" (720p/60fps when "High")
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 6500 3.2 GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1500X 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 ti or AMD Radeon™ RX 570 (VRAM 4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c or better)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/40fps when graphics settings are set to "High"

supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Vietnamese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese - Portugal, Japanese, Thai, Polish, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support
